statements: SELECT * FROM equipment_inventory;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity FROM equipment_inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, location FROM equipment_inventory WHERE weight < 50;
SELECT * FROM equipment_inventory WHERE location = 'Warehouse';
SELECT equipment_name, weight FROM equipment_inventory ORDER BY weight DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, weight, quantity, location FROM equipment_inventory WHERE weight > 10 ORDER BY quantity DESC, equipment_name ASC
SELECT * FROM equipment_inventory WHERE location = 'Storage Room' AND weight < 20 ORDER BY equipment_id ASC
SELECT equipment_name, location, quantity FROM equipment_inventory WHERE quantity >= 5 ORDER BY location DESC
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, weight FROM equipment_inventory WHERE weight = 15 OR quantity < 3 ORDER BY equipment_id DESC
SELECT equipment_name, location FROM equipment_inventory WHERE weight BETWEEN 10 AND 20 ORDER BY location ASC, equipment_name ASC
SELECT * FROM Equipment
SELECT name, weight FROM Equipment WHERE quantity > 0
SELECT equipment_id, name, quantity FROM Equipment ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT * FROM CrossFitClasses WHERE instructor LIKE '%John%'
SELECT class_name, time_start, time_end FROM CrossFitClasses ORDER BY time_start
SELECT * FROM Equipment WHERE weight > 10 ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT name, weight FROM Equipment WHERE quantity > 5 ORDER BY weight DESC
SELECT equipment_id, name, quantity FROM Equipment WHERE weight BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY equipment_id
SELECT * FROM CrossFitClasses WHERE instructor = 'John Doe' ORDER BY time_start
SELECT class_name, instructor, time_start, time_end FROM CrossFitClasses ORDER BY class_name
SELECT * FROM weights WHERE weight_quantity > 10
SELECT weight_name, weight_size FROM weights ORDER BY weight_size DESC
SELECT rope_type, rope_length, rope_color FROM ropes WHERE rope_length <= 50
SELECT * FROM mats WHERE mat_type = 'Yoga Mat'
SELECT mat_height FROM mats WHERE mat_width = 24
SELECT * FROM weights WHERE weight_quantity > 10 ORDER BY weight_name DESC
SELECT rope_type, COUNT(*) FROM ropes GROUP BY rope_type ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC
SELECT mat_type, mat_height, mat_width FROM mats WHERE mat_type LIKE '%yoga%'
SELECT * FROM weights w INNER JOIN ropes r ON w.weight_id = r.rope_id WHERE w.weight_quantity > 5 AND r.rope_length < 50
SELECT DISTINCT mat_height, mat_width FROM mats WHERE mat_height > 10 AND mat_width < 20
SELECT * FROM Equipment;
SELECT name, type FROM Equipment WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT equipment_id, name, type, quantity FROM Equipment ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Weights WHERE weight > 50.0;
SELECT rope_id, material FROM Ropes WHERE length < 20.0;
SELECT * FROM Equipment WHERE quantity > 5 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT type FROM Equipment WHERE quantity BETWEEN 1 AND 10;
SELECT name, type FROM Equipment WHERE type = 'Cardio' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT e.name, w.weight FROM Equipment e JOIN Weights w ON e.equipment_id = w.equipment_id WHERE w.weight > 50;
SELECT r.length, r.material, e.name FROM Ropes r JOIN Equipment e ON r.rope_id = e.equipment_id;
SELECT * FROM weights;
SELECT weight_name, weight_size FROM weights WHERE weight_type = 'Barbell';
SELECT rope_length, rope_material FROM ropes ORDER BY rope_length DESC;
SELECT mat_color FROM mats WHERE mat_size = 'Large' AND mat_type = 'Yoga';
SELECT class_name, instructor_id, class_time FROM classes WHERE class_time > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT * FROM weights WHERE weight_type = 'Barbell' ORDER BY weight_size DESC;
SELECT rope_length, rope_material FROM ropes WHERE rope_material LIKE '%nylon';
SELECT mat_id, mat_color FROM mats WHERE mat_type = 'Yoga' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM equipment_inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY equipment_type ASC, quantity DESC;
SELECT class_name, instructor_id FROM classes WHERE class_time >= NOW() AND class_time <= NOW() + INTERVAL '1' HOUR;
